name: UserMicroservice
description: User's Miscroservice for a barricaded security

scripts.server: cross-env DEBUG=platolio-users:* PORT=4040 nodemon --exec babel-node server.js
scripts.start-add-user: cross-env DEBUG=platolio-users:* PORT=4040 nodemon --exec babel-node scripts/add-user.js
scripts.start-find-user: cross-env DEBUG=platolio-users:* PORT=4040 nodemon --exec babel-node scripts/find-user.js jameskila@gmail.com
scripts.start-update-user: cross-env DEBUG=platolio-users:* PORT=4040 nodemon --exec babel-node scripts/update-user.js steevegrider@gmail.com
scripts.start-delete-user: cross-env DEBUG=platolio-users:* PORT=4040 nodemon --exec babel-node scripts/delete-user.js jameshash@yahoo.com
scripts.start-list-users: cross-env DEBUG=platolio-users:* PORT=4040 nodemon --exec babel-node scripts/list-users.js

author: Steven Daye <dev.stevendaye@yahoo.com>
